name: SEASIDE - Historic Antique Residence
description:
WINEYARD WITH COLOURS OF THE SEASIDE.

In a part of Sicily that is still undiscovered by mass tourism lies VILLA SALINARA, a peaceful retreat with complete privacy, a romantic getaway or solitary sanctuary.
Charming historic 18th century farm immersed in nature along with the blue Mediterranean sea, surrounded by antique salt marshes, vineyards, and olive groves.
host_about:
Hi, this is Yumi, I  am a Japanese, I speak Japanese, Italian and English.
My husband is an Italian, speaks Italian, English, French and Spanish. 
We have 2 beautiful boys.

I have lived most of my life in Tokyo, then one day I decided to move to Rome.
After almost 10 years in Rome, we decided to move to Sicily that we fell in love at first sight.

I believe in what Goethe saying. "You have to come here, to Sicily, in order to understand Italy."

Our villa is held with love and Japanese precision, decorated with an authentic Italian, specially Sicilian style. The historic name of the villa is SALINARA.

Just 500 meters from mediterranean sea with many islands close to. We are living small city named Marsala, famous for beautiful sea, archeology, foods and especially wine. I am a sommelier too.

We really enjoy to meet new guests and share some pieces of Sicilian slow life.  More than 15 years experiences and curiosity for Sicily make your vacation much more interesting.

We have a passion for sailing, traveling, organic gardening, living more sustainably with wonderful nature of Sicily.

Thank you for reading our profile and hope to see you soon in Sicily!

@salinarasicily

Yumi & Adriano

name: Palermo Cheapest Apartments - 4
description: Charming apartment located in the city center 2 minutes from the main square of Palermo. Fully equipped with private kitchen and bathroom, FREE INTERNET Wi-Fi, washing machine, TV, microwave, electric kettle, air con, heating, crockery and linen.
neighborhood_overview:
Located near the local street market of 'Borgo Vecchio', where it is possible to buy food or stop to taste the authentic dishes of the cuisine of Palermo. Very close to the main shopping area and more suggestive places of the old town.

Some suggestions for the transfer, if you get the taxi let's ask to the driver to go to Piazza Luigi Sturzo, our apartments are in a small street in the middle of this square.
If you take the shuttle bus from the airport (Palermo or Trapani airport) please get off at Piazza Castelnuovo and Politeama Theatre, at the corner with Via Emerico Amari n.170. The shuttle bus from Palermo airport will take around 40 - 50 minutes to arrive to the city centre. From Trapani airport you can reach Palermo downtown by bus in 70 - 80 minutes.
Once you arrive at the bus stop you can easily walk only 5 minutes to the apartment.
host_about: I'm Riccardo Morello a marketing professional who loves travelling, meeting new cultures and people.

name: Casa Nicola
description: Our house is dipped into the quiet Sicilian countryside, two kilometers from the sea of Acitrezza. In the large outdoor patio in the shade of old vine, the olive tree and the apricot tree you can enjoy your breakfasts and dinners.  You can have a bath in the relaxing family swimming-pool. The swimming-pool is available from april/may to october
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located near a village village. Tranquility and clean air. The name of the neighborhood is Barracks, but the area is also called "Via dei Mulini", due to the numerous water mills that arose, for the grain mill until the 1950s. Some have been refurbished and today are beautiful manor houses. One of these, now private homes, has the canal with the water flowing below. The area is very rich with water springs and the ancient Romans chose this site to settle down, calling it Akis. Today's Acireale was born here, then moved in the centuries a few kilometers further north. The Terme di S.Venera al Pozzo is the one remaining at the time of the old Akis. The archaeological area can be visited every day.
Since 1400, in the square of Reitana, about 2 km from the house, Lupins are sold, typical Sicilian legume, made edible by skilled hands that keep it in water for almost seven days. A real delight tasted with lemon juice and salt.
At the margins of the Timpa di Aci, every
host_about:
Io e la mia famiglia viviamo in questa splendida casa attaccata all'abitazione indicata sul sito. Ci piace viaggiare, praticare sport, e fare lunghe passeggiate . Ci piace molto anche cucinare e preparare fantastici dolci.
Veniteci a trovare vivrete delle magnifiche giornate, e comprenderete l'ospitalità siciliana.

name: Casa di campagna in Sicilia
description: Characteristic country house, 4 double bedrooms, living room on two levels with fireplace, two bathrooms, kitchen, covered outdoor space. Typical Sicilian landscape, wheat hills, olive trees, and forest. Between Palermo and the Valley of the Temples of Agrigento.
host_about: Mi presento: sono Elena, nata a Palermo, dove vivo, dopo aver trascorso 15 anni a Milano. Il mio motto è che la bellezza è dovunque la si sappia vedere, e con occhi amorevoli vivo la mia città, Palermo, bella, colta, eppur ricca di contraddizioni, ma affascinante, ed accogliente nelle relazioni umane, nella lentezza come virtù di dare valore ad ogni cosa, e senso del piacere e del vivere in una dimensione umana. Amo il mare, la campagna siciliana, ricca di colline, ora verdi di grano ora gialle o marroni come il velluto nei tempi della semina. Amo la piazza Marina, in cui vivo, una quinta scenica fuori dal mondo, con i suoi alberi secolari, i palazzi antichi, il mercatino dell'antiquariato la domenica, e quel "conoscersi tutti", che ti fa sentire parte del tutto. Palermo accoglie, si mostra nella sua bellezza, dove senza pudore mostra angoli di povertà accanto a palazzi storici memoria di antiche vestigia. Vi invito a conoscerla, a venire, a lasciarsi andare ad un turismo "morbido"..
amenities: ["Shampoo", "Indoor fireplace", "Dedicated workspace", "Heating", "Kitchen", "Free parking on premises", "Essentials", "Washer", "TV"]

name: Camera Superior - Milo Etna
description: "Villa Loriana" offers you a relaxing stay in full contact with nature. From the quiet village where it is located, you can easily reach destination coveted by tourists such as Taormina-Isola Bella-Catania-Etna.
neighborhood_overview:
Milo is a village of 1089 inhabitants,located on the slopes of Etna this beautiful and reserved village is provided with all the necessary services to spend your holiday pleasantly. Cool in summer and snowy but cozy in winter, Milo boasts a strategic location that allows the visitor to enjoy a view that extends from Catania to Taormina and on certain days to Calabria. Vera mistress of Casa is Etna who takes over the scene with its wonderful and unpredictable eruptions.

You'll find out the rest for yourself.
host_about:
Ciao a tutti! Sono  Luca e da qualche anno mi occupo con amore e dedizione di questa bellissima attività! Amo molto la natura e quindi il contatto intimo e piacevole che solo la montagna con i suoi profumi ed i suoi colori può regalarti. Proprio per questo motivo ritengo che la scelta di aprire l’attività nel tranquillo paese di Milo, sia stata la più indicata per me e quindi anche per i miei ospiti essendo ubicati a pochi passi dal Parco Nazionale dell'Etna e poche decine di minuti di auto da altre bellissime località quali Taormina, Isola Bella, Acitrezza, Catania, le Gole dell’Alcantara.. ecc 
Tengo a precisare che in struttura, sono presenti un cane di nome Thomas ed un gatto di nome Leo, da me adottati in quanto amante degli animali nonché piacevolissimi amici di compagnia. Spero che questo non sia un problema per i miei ospiti essendo entrambi educatissimi, giocherelloni e dolcissimi! Concludo questa breve presentazione augurandomi di poter conoscere grazie a quest’attività tanta bella gente (come finora è stato) e augurando a voi di essere ospiti prima o dopo a Villa Loriana, in modo da poterne mi apprezzare le qualità descritte poc’anzi e lasciarsi coccolare dal comfort che le nostre camere offrono. A presto
Luca

A large modern residence comprising of all modern conveniences and swimming pool gardens and gorgeous roof top meals terrace . This property is NOT SHARED with other guests.
neighborhood_overview:
Although only meters from the coast, Our typical seaside Sicilian town is surrounded by picturesque mountains, most notably Italy's most active volcano Mt Etna. Only a short drive away, this popular tourist attraction is a must see. Take a guided tour where you can see the lava flow and if lucky at night, you may even see this from the property's roof top terrace.

SEAFOOD Restaurants ? everywhere! straight from the Mediterranean to your plate!
Would you like to BBQ your own?
Fresh seafood available every morning 50 meters from CASA MARCO POLO, by the shore. Also in Summer, Mr Granita drives by the door so you can enjoy Sicilys famous fresh granitas & brioche(highly recommended)
Taormina, one of Sicilys most famous mountain top towns is situated approx. 15km along the motorway which is only 10 minutes from the residence.
The beautiful Baroque town of Arcireale is also close by and don't forget to check out the very popular Gole dell Alcantara, where
host_about:
Hi ! We are HOME MADE STAYS  (Michael , Tony and Rino .)
We are  outgoing  people who run our own individual  businesses which takes us to lots of interesting places all over the world.

  Our other passion is hosting  our beautiful properties either in  St Kilda Melbourne ,and in Sicily,Italy  (Torre Archirafi) , Riposto, Not far from the magical Taormina.

Home made stays  is extremely attentive to all your holiday needs from organizing transfers, advice on places to see and local restaurants   , "no stone is left unturned"

Vivo in Sicilia, amo e rispetto la natura.
Per questa ragione la maggior parte dell'energia elettrica consumata nelle mie case vacanze è auto prodotta dal nostro impianto fotovoltaico.

name: Al Bastione Holiday House
description:
The house is located in front of the ancient walls of the Bastion of Porta Guccia, equipped with every comfort and in modern style, double room with attached bathroom, and in a single environment three areas divided by two arches, area with single bed, area with sofa bed and TV, living kitchen area.
You will be a 7-minute walk from the Cathedral, Norman Palace and Teatro Massimo.
Free parking is available on the street.
Shuttle service available for a fee at an affordable cost.
neighborhood_overview: The street where the apartment is located has always been an area of antique dealers, a 5-minute walk from the Corso Finocchiaro Aprile, a shopping street where you will find supermarkets and shops for shopping, but also fast food with traditional dishes open 24/24 hours. Just a 10-minute walk from Piazza del Tribunale you can reach the area of Teatro Massimo in Piazza Verdi where you will find restaurants, bars and nightclubs, where you can spend unforgettable evenings. On the other side of the road, a 7-minute walk will take you to the royal palace and the cathedral. In front of the new door (royal palace) you will find the Free bus stop that will take you around the historic center. As soon as you arrive it will be my responsibility to provide you with a map of the city and give you all the information you need.

name: Villa Del Quarzo
description:
Enjoy the sea breeze and the stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea from my villa with the sunny terrace and the private garden!
Located in Plemmirio the property provides close proximity to Siracusa (15 minutes drive).
neighborhood_overview:
The surrounding areas offer a crystal clear blue sea and fabulous beaches with breathtaking views that will make your holiday unforgettable. Here, the coast offers both a typical rocky shoreline (Costa Bianca, Varco23) and fine sandy beaches as Arenella, Fontane Bianche, Vendicari, San Lorenzo (from 5 to 20 minutes drive).
The neighbourhood is very quiet and has a grocery store and bar/pizzeria close by (2 minutes drive or 5 minutes walk).
host_about:
I'm a jazz musician and composer currently residing in Siracusa, Italy. I often use Airbnb to enjoy local experience while traveling. 

Recently I've decided to share my holiday houses with guests from around the world who are happy to enjoy an authentic experience to recharge and immerse themselves in Sicilian slow living.

 I am at your disposal for any further information you may need.

name: Bed and Breakfast “Il Glicine”: Comfort Room
description:
The B&B IL GLICINE is situated in the peaceful surroundings of the ETNA Nature Park, between the Europe's largest and most active volcano and the fantastic sea and beaches of the Natural Reserve of Fiumefreddo di Sicilia.
Thanks to its strategic position, this B&B is an optimal point of departure:
Taormina is just 15 minutes far.
Le gole dell' Alcantara: 20 minutes
The Etna: 20 minutes
Fiumefreddo' beaches: 15 minutes
Giardini Naxos' beaches: 20 minutes
Catania: 30 minutes.
Siracusa: 50 minutes.
neighborhood_overview:
Thanks to its strategic position, our B&B is an optimal point of departure for all the naturalistic excursions and artistic/cultural visits that every guest loves to do during his vacation in Sicily.
Taormina is just 15 minutes far.

Giardini Naxos: 15 minutes

name: A'SCALUNATA VILLA EOLIANA PADRONALE
description: Antica Casa Filicudara residential type "manor" type. It allows you to experience Filicudi in its aspects of tradition, sea, countryside, in total privacy, tranquility, relaxation. The owner on site, assist guests with the house and the island.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the area called "Canale" but is not part of a neighborhood with multiple houses
host_about:
Sono approdato a Filicudi nel 1968 per fare immersioni subacquee.
Dal 1978 ho casa sull'isola e ci vivo 6 mesi l'anno: mi conoscono tutti e io continuo ad entusiasmarmi scoprendo l'isola, la sua terra, il suo mare, il suo cielo,  la sua gente, le sue tradizioni...
Da qualche anno coltivo una vigna e produco un mio vino sul posto.
Mi piace essere a disposizione dei miei ospiti sul posto ed assisterli direttamente, senza intermediari, in modo da rendere il loro soggiorno il più tranquillo e rilassante possibile.

host_about: Ciao, il mio nome è  Germana, e sono il co-founder di  Dimore in Sicily, società di gestione immobiliare turistica , costituita da giovani property manager di comprovata esperienza , ogni appartamento da noi selezionato, rispetta alti standard di qualità in modo da garantire la migliore esperienza possibile ai nostri ospiti. Per arricchire la nostra offerta turistica , e rendere il vostro soggiorno nei nostri appartamenti, il più completo possibile , ci avvaliamo di un Tour Operator formato da giovani siciliani con una profonda conoscenza del territorio e che utilizza i più innovativi strumenti digitali, capaci di soddisfare le richieste dell'odierno mercato turistico legato al vacation rental. Itinerari a tema, percorsi ed esperienze, sono pensati specificatamente per promuovere l'autentica scoperta del territorio e delle sue tradizioni, abbattendo barriere linguistiche e culturali. I nostri ospiti potranno organizzare la propria vacanza in piena libertà ed autonomia, ma con la garanzia di essere seguiti in ogni fase della loro permanenza.

name: Villa Malò
description: The Aeolian-style villa is located in the hamlet of Quattropani and enjoys a unique view of Panarea and Stromboli. The house has a land of about 7,000 square meters and inside it consists of a double bedroom with air conditioning, a bathroom with shower and a living room with kitchen and sofa bed, large Aeolian style terrace with ducchene and cleaning where you can relax enjoying a breathtaking view... Villa Malò is a quiet place for a dream vacation!
neighborhood_overview: The Aeolian Islands are a volcanic archipelago of which two active volcanoes are a part: Stromboli and Vulcano. The islands have been called “the seven pearls of the Mediterranean” thanks to their extraordinary charm. Each of them offers different attractions even if their common denominator is the splendor of the waters and the charm of the surrounding nature. Alicudi and Filicudi are the oldest and even the most pristine; Panarea is the smallest and most frequented by a young audience thanks to the liveliness of nightlife; Vulcano is famous for its natural ponds of hot mud; Lipari is the largest and most popular; Salina is renowned for the production of capers and malvasia, the so-called "nectar of the gods"; Stromboli presents itself as a huge black giant in permanent eruptive activity, at night you can see his flames at great distance, which is why the island has also been called "Tirreno lighthouse".  In this regard, we strongly suggest experiencing the fire skiing experience, a n

name: Agave di DIMORE del Valentino
description: Large double room with 1 or 2 extra beds, kitchenette, bathroom and covered veranda
neighborhood_overview: The property is located just 2 km from the beach of Sampieri and a few minutes by car from the beautiful baroque cities of Scicli, Modica and Ragusa
host_about:
In una incantevole valle ricolma di verde rigoglioso nato per avvolgere un luogo pieno di calore, di esperienza e di storia, sorgono le Dimore Del Valentino. Qui la serenità ed il relax fanno da cornice alla dicotomia dei paesaggi, ora mitizzato dalla macchia mediterranea, ora dallo splendore dei rarissimi esemplari di piante succulente amorevolmente coltivate da Giovanni e Marina nel loro Vivaio, vero e proprio parco naturale di oltre diecimila metri quadrati incastonato nell’estremo Sud della Sicilia orientale, nel territorio di Scicli città Unesco e gemma del Val di Noto. 
Goditi una vacanza rilassante e piacevole in armonia con la natura circostante.

Recensioni



Un posto stupendo, circondato da un vivaio eccezionalmente rigoglioso. Lo stile della struttura, di grande qualità, è perfettamente rispettoso dell'ambiente in cui si trova. Pace e tranquillità, cibi genuini buonissimi. Grandissima accoglienza, educazione e disponibilità da parte dei proprietari.“bellissimo !!!!” 21/06/2015



Ogni descrizione sarebbe riduttiva... semplicemente grazie a Marina e tutta la sua splendida famiglia per aver creato un luogo così accogliente... Le Dimore sono incantevoli ma senza di voi non sarebbe la stessa esperienza!!! Ci rivediamo il prossimo anno !!! Ovviamente consigliatissimo a tutti e per tutti (coppie, famiglie, amici o anche da soli)mariluna_roma, 16/09/2014



In questo posto è tutto perfetto: la campagna che accoglie e la vicina città di Scicli con i monumenti tra i più belli della zona, oltre al Commissariato di Montalbano.. La gentilezza del padrone di casa, la bellezza degli appartamenti ricavati da una masseria ottocentesca, lo stupore di vivere in un vivaio di piante succulente. Bellissimi gli arredi recuperati dalla...FedericaRaggio 16/01/2015



Che dire ancora !!?? Scrissi già sulle Dimore alcuni anni fa... e nel frattempo altri hanno scritto, naturalmente in positivo. Non si potrebbe altrimenti !!! L'attenzione verso il cliente è sempre speciale, la cura per il luogo è sempre di altissimo livello, l'entusiasmo per continuare a crescere non manca mai !!30/06/2014

La nostra storia

"Giovanni Allibrio e sua moglie Marina continueranno a coltivare in maniche di camicia cactacee e succulente in grandi esemplari. I loro vivai del Valentino dispongono di oltre 10.000 metri quadrati di serre fredde, ma è molta di più la terra in cui, ordinatamente in fila, crescono all’aperto vistosi esemplari.Qualche decennio fa il padre di Giovanni acquistò questi terreni sassosi e ben esposti a due passi dal mare, lo stesso mare che fa da sfondo e dà atmosfera agli sceneggiati del commissario Montalbano. Al tempo dell’acquisto c’erano solo isole di macchia mediterranea, radi carrubi centenari, qualche fico d’India, capperi, una masseria ottocentesca abbandonata. Poi Giovanni, completati gli studi di perito agrario, ha impiantato coltivazioni di ortaggi e un giorno, a fargli cambiare direzione, è arrivato Guglielmo Betto. Originario di Scicli e trasferitosi a Roma, questo AVVOCATO che ha dato molto alla divulgazione e alla passione in Italia per le piante esotiche all’inizio degli anni Novanta fece visita al vivaio durante una rimpatriata in Sicilia. Betto suggerì le prime piante da seminare, insegnò i suoi trucchi di esperto, seguì con affetto i primi successi.

A trent'anni dall’esordio Giovanni e Marina continuano a investire sulla professionalità, sulla voglia di fare e di imparare, sul desiderio di mantenere vivo il territorio che amano. Adesso che i tre figli sono grandi, nel loro progetto di vita e lavoro hanno aggiunto le mostre di giardinaggio in giro per l’Italia, aule e programmi come fattoria didattica (la seconda nata in Sicilia) e un delizioso agriturismo, che hanno chiamato Dimore del Valentino, in una parte non usata della masseria, con migliaia di grandi succulente in coltivazione attorno". Mimma Pallavicino, 
Giornalista specializzata, ha contribuito alla nascita delle riviste "Giardini" e "Giardinaggio", è collaboratrice storica di "Gardenia" e tiene un blog molto frequentato

name: Private Room for WOMEN : Taormina Historic Center
description:
No matter with which personal background MOST WELCOME !
Stay at this comfortable, spacious apartment in the middle of the beautiful historic center of Taormina (located directly above the pedestrian zone Corso Umberto).
neighborhood_overview:
in the same house a peaceful italian family lives permanently on the 2nd floor upon you.
sometimes also on the 2nd floor live italian and foreign airbnb guests like you.
host_about:
As a passionate nature, children and animal lover I spend a lot of time with them. Apart from working as a language teacher with children and adults (in German, English, Italian and French), I love to volunteer for asylum seekers which need help with integration and language learning. To feel alive and healthy I do jogging, swimming, hiking, pilgrims, gardening, rowing and cycling and enjoy going to the theatre, listening to music and travelling. I grew up and went to school both in Sicily, Italy, and in Switzerland. Due to this background my first mother tongue is Italian, followed by Swiss German and German. As I've always been interested in languages, I have learnt to speak English, French and Spanish as well.
If required by my guests in Taormina, I'd love to use the opportunity of airbnb for cultural exchange and for the practice of my foreign language skills. I could show you around the picturesque town of Taormina, take you to do watersports at the sea or to hike in the nearby hills and give you a lot of recommendations on what to eat, visit, do and see in Taormina or all around Sicily. just ask me if you re intersted.
One of my favourite places in Sicily is my father's garden in Piedimonte. There he's grown various fruit trees which grant us delicious figs, plums, mulberries, peaches, cherries and apricots. They taste the best when freshly picked! If you're equipped with a mosquito spray, join me on a trip to his garden, situated at the feet of Mount Etna, our majestic vulcano!

"To have seen Italy without having seen Sicily is not to have seen Italy at all, for Sicily is the clue to everything." (Johann Wolfgang von Goethe)

name: Solemar Sicilia - Mer et Soleil - Vulcano
description: Stylishly furnished in a contemporary Mediterranean style and surrounded by lush vegetation, Bungalow Vulcano has two double bedroom, two brights bathrooms with shower and bidet, a living room with a dining table. Self-catering, it is fitted with a small, fully equipped kitchenette. The property also has air conditioning (both hot and cold), mosquito nets,a washing machine, wi-fi throughout, secure off-road parking and a private sea-view terrace.
neighborhood_overview: the area inland from Mongerbino is characterised by rolling hills, dramatic ragged outcrops, verdant groves and all the colours of the Mediterranean's lush vegetation. Just a few steps from your front door is the Monte Catalfano nature reserve, a picturesque spot for walking, hiking and outdoor sports with a spectacular view around every corner. Mer et Soleil has private access to a small cove for bathing, and is also just 200m from the nearest public beach. host_about:
Se cercate molta privacy, pace, serenità e quiete in riva ad un mare limpidissimo, il
BB Relais Euterpini é il vostro posto ideale, con il lusso che solo i grandi spazi
possono  offrire. Quattro ettari a pineta e macchia mediterranea celano, sparsi al
loro interno, nove prestigiosi dammusi che si affacciano sul mare, lato tramonto, costruiti con grande amore e rispetto del luogo; questa almeno è una delle prime sensazioni che molti nostri ospiti colgono già fin dalla prima volta che entrano in questo piccolo angolo di Paradiso. I dammusi di Pantelleria sono tipiche costruzioni locali la cui origine risale addietro nei secoli, con spessi muri che proteggono dalle forti calure estive: non dimentichiamo che geograficamente Pantelleria fa parte del continente Africano e si trova tra la Tunisia e Malta. I nostri dammusi sono tutti completamente autonomi, con propria cucina e sono forniti di aria condizionata e riscaldamento invernale. Vengono offerti con prezzi diversi in considerazione delle loro diverse misure (fino a 75 mq coperti per ospite) e della loro distanza dal mare. La particolare cura che viene posta nel dare la massima accoglienza é premiata dall'affetto con il quale i nostri ospiti o i loro amici tornano così volentieri agli Euterpini. Maggiore ai due terzi è infatti la percentuale di coloro che, anche per sentito dire, ogni anno ci onorano della loro presenza. ln buona parte, vengono per farsi da noi viziare e ricaricare le batterie" in totale relax. Anche se forniamo assistenza nell'affittare gommoni o barche, con o senza marinaio, molti dei nostri ospiti, dopo un'appetitosa prima colazione a base di prodotti locali, piuttosto preferiscono starsene sdraiati sul
nostro prato in riva al mare, dove possono scegliere tra zone in ombra o al sole, con
sdraio e fresche docce. ln alternativa, possono disporre di una grande piscina
d'acqua dolce, una benessere ed un idromassaggio. Per gli acquisti, siamo quasi
equidistanti tra i due maggiori centri: Pantelleria centro e Scauri a dieci minuti
d'auto, mentre Khamma è raggiungibile in circa mezz'ora.

name: B&B Aruci Biancomangiare
description:
The Aruci B&B is conveniently located in the heart of the historic "Borgata" district.
1 kilometer from the Sanctuary of the Madonnina and the Catacombs of San Giovanni, 2 kilometers from the famous Greek Theatre that every year hosts the classic performances famous throughout the world, 600 meters from the Latomie of the Capuchins and cycle path, 300 meters from the Piazza di Santa Lucia and only 200 meters from the public descent to the sea.
The island of Ortigia is 15/20 minutes by foot!
neighborhood_overview:
The Borgata di Santa Lucia neighborhood, called by the Syracusans "a buggata", is one of the most important historic neighborhoods in Syracuse like Ortigia and the Neapolis neighborhood, although it is located in the "old suburbs" of the city (almost all the buildings of the village are ninth-century construction).
This neighborhood, although rising within Syracuse, is quite quiet and popular surrounded by the towns of Sicily.
It occupies the eastern part of the Syracusan city and is between Viale Teocrito (to the north), Viale Luigi Cadorna (to the west), Via Arsenale (to the south) and the Dioniso il Grande Riviera (to the east) and is formed inside by grilled streets that converge at the great Piazza Santa Lucia.

neighborhood_overview:
San Vito Lo Capo is a beautiful town located in the province of Trapani, Sicily. This charming seaside village is famous for its fine white sand beaches, crystal clear waters, and natural wonders.

One of the main attractions of San Vito Lo Capo is the Church - Sanctuary of San Vito Martire. This religious building, located in the center of the village, is an important place of worship for the local community. The church is characterized by beautiful architecture and inside you can admire traditional frescoes and decorations.

In addition to visiting the Church - Sanctuary of San Vito Martire, San Vito Lo Capo offers many other activities and attractions. You can take a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, enjoy the delicious typical Sicilian cuisine in the local restaurants, and shop in the downtown boutiques.

Nature lovers will be able to explore the Zingaro Nature Reserve, a beautiful protected area that offers breathtaking scenery, scenic trails, an

description:
Ours is a beach house 150 meters away you can dive into a crystal clear sea and then lie in the sun or rest under the veranda on the ground floor always ventilated. An atmosphere of full relaxation, the sun and the sea, the scents, the scents, the sand and its golden dunes, the Mediterranean vegetation and the color of the stone with which many houses are built will make you fall in love, as it has happened to us, of the Ijob coast.
A few kilometers away you can visit the baroque towns of Scicli, Modica, Ragusa-Ibla and Noto.
neighborhood_overview: We are directly on the beach, the house is not isolated, they are a group of houses and rooftops attached to each other. You fall asleep and wake up to the sound of the sea, with the scents of the Mediterranean scrub. If you want and like to walk, walk to the beach in the village of Donnalucata , about 1300 meters, where you buy from the fishermen the catch of the day, the tomatoes, apricots, zucchini etc. of the farmer, eat a granita with brioche in Blue  Amun and pick up the way home. In the afternoon if you are not at sea you can visit the small and baroque towns of Scicli with its Beneventano palace, the city of Modica with its churches and the beautiful Ragusa Ibla, or the castle of Donnafugata or the mouth of the Ermino River, the wildlife oasis of Vendicari, take a bigger tour of the Val di Noto, in Capo Passero, the beautiful beach of Cala Mosche to the village of Marzamemi where you can wait for the sunset. Piazza Armerina Roman mosaics preserved very well and then much more.
host_about: Salve sono un medico Pediatra da ormai 30 anni, ho un marito e 2 figli maschi, vivo la mia casa siciliana spesso con mio marito e a volte anche con tutta la famiglia. Per noi è un posto magico, dove il tempo sembra essersi fermato, le persone hanno piacere a parlare con te. Se venite nostri ospiti spero troverete un'accogliena familiare.

name: Casa San Pietro
description: Casa San Pietro is in the center of Modica. It is a historic residence, which has unique characteristics of attention to the recovery of environments that are once inhabited in the rock. The floors, all with concrete bricks from different decorations, have been brought to its former glory. It has 4 balconies with an extraordinary view of the Duomo di San Pietro and San Giorgio. Design-conscious finishes.
neighborhood_overview:
Behind Casa San Pietro winds the Cartellone neighborhood. The Jewish community, according to a 1492 census, was about 1/20 of the entire Jewish population of the island. The Jews occupied a specific neighborhood in Modica, which came to the present day with the name of “Poster”: a sign indicated to Christians who from there had started the Jewish neighborhood, “where Jewish laws were noted and that Jews were attached to the walls of the streets.”

There was also a synagogue, of which unfortunately there is no trace of today due to a terrible excitement on August 15, 1474. Some Modicans made an appointment in the square of the church of Santa Maria in Bethlehem and went to the Cartellone: there they rushed against the community, killing about 360 Jews and looting the area. Many years later, throughout Sicily, this anger resulted in the expulsion of the Jews from the island, which took place in 1492.
host_about:
Sono nata a Modica e la amo infinitamente.
I suoi colori, le sue strade, il suo calore, i suoi odori. A tutti i miei ospiti sarà fatto un dono. Perché lo meritano: hanno scelto Modica!
"Mi richiama talvolta la tua voce, 
e non so che cieli ed acque
mi si svegliano dentro:
una rete di sole che si smaglia
sui tuoi muri ch'erano a sera
un dondolio di lampade
dalle botteghe tarde" 
S. Quasimodo

name: Seafront home
description: My house is directly on the beach in a tiny village called Trappeto, on the Golfo di Castellammare. It is very well positioned, roughly 20 mins from the airport of Palermo. It has 2 master bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom, a 3rd room with bunker bed, an additional bathroom. Both bathrooms have, wide showers. The house has 2 terraces on the ground floor and one roof top terrace with breath taking view. We also have an inside sofa to relax, when you want to be cozy inside.
neighborhood_overview: Trappeto is a fishermen's village, but it has all you need. There is a supermarket, grocery shops, pizzerie on the promenade. It is only a 10 minutes' drive from Balestrate, a bigger town, where you can have more proposals of shops and restaurants. What I love most about Trappeto is that you can walk from our house to the town's centre and basically everywhere.
host_about: Hello! My name is Emanuela, I am a video and photo producer living in Milan. I love traveling, reading, photography, music and spending time in my magic retreat in Sicily where I come from. I have just renovated it with all the love and care possible and would be happy to share it with you!

name: Beautiful Villa with Pool in Marsala
description: With a superb location in Marsala, a wonderful large pool, and a wonderful Sicilian style, this recently restored villa is a great choice. With space for up to 10 guests, you can really enjoy the Sicilian sunshine when staying here. Either relax by the pool or go and explore the wonderful surrounding area.
neighborhood_overview:
West Sicily is yours to discover when staying at this villa! Its position in Marsala is second to none. Marsala is a charming town with a beautiful centre full of wine bars and great restaurants. It's perfect for a passeggiata! The area is also full of wineries which you can visit for tastings.

Trapani is also close to the villa. This is another lovely Sicilian seafront town. Take a stroll through the centre, or walk along the coast and take in the sea views out to the Aegadian Islands.

Above Trapani you will find Erice. Either drive up the winding road or take the handy cable car from Trapani itself. Erice is a magical hilltop town, evocative of a fairy take. Walk through the charming town, visit the Venus Castle and enjoy the unique atmosphere.

Slightly further away is San Vito lo Capo. This is one of Sicily's most popular seaside towns and it is clear to see why – the long sandy beach is a dream come to life!

name: Shanti House: lussuosa villetta a passi dal Mare
description:
Bright and luxurious villa recently renovated and very close to the wonderful beach of Santa Maria del Focallo (RG).
Located behind "Floripa Yoga & Kitesurf House", the villa is perfect for 2 people with the possibility of adding a third bed. It is also an excellent option for those who want to work remotely while surrounded by a great community of people! Equipped with all comforts (air conditioning, heating, dishwasher, washing machine, TV, wifi). Possibility of doing yoga and kitesurfing.
neighborhood_overview:
English below.

The accommodation is located behind the Floripa Yoga & Kitesurf House where you can lean on services such as meals, beachfront, yoga and kitesurfing classes etc.
Get ready to meet a vibrant international community or enjoy your privacy while you work or take a dip in the bathtub in the bedroom in front of the gorgeous garden trees.
The blue flag beach of Santa Maria del Focallo is one hundred meters away.

The accommodation is located behind “Floripa Yoga & Kitesurf House” where you can rely on services such as meals, lido on the beach, yoga and kitesurfing lessons etc.
Get ready to meet a vibrant international community or enjoy your privacy while you work or take a soak in the tub in the bedroom facing the beautiful trees in the garden.

host_about:
Ciao e Piacere! (English below!)

Dopo 14 anni passati in giro per il mondo, ho deciso di rientrare in Sicilia nel 2013 e da allora gestisco alcune bellissime proprietà a pochi passi dal mare, un B&B sul mare dove insegno anche yoga, una scuola di kitesurf e di surf, e un piccolo surf shop! Credo che sia fondamentale vivere in armonia con la natura e il ritmo del mare, per questo pratico un po' tutti gli sport acquatici, in base alle condizioni del vento e delle onde del giorno: dal kitesurf al surf, dal windsurf al Sup Yoga. Adoro viaggiare e tutti gli anni, quando la stagione turistica in Sicilia finisce, parto per 4 mesi e da host divento ospite Airbnb! 
Oltre al mare, che è la mia passione più grande, amo cucinare (vegetariano!), e pratico (e insegno) yoga, skate, e amo leggere libri di filosofia orientale (Lao Tzu è una fonte di ispirazione!). 
Come host cerco di essere sempre a vostra disposizione, per cui quando siete mie ospiti vi prego di avvisarmi se avete bisogno di qualcosa e ovviamente potete contattarmi per consigliarvi posti da conoscere e ristoranti!
....
Hello! Nice to meet you!
After spending 14 years living and traveling around the world, I decided to return to Sicily in 2013. Since then I manage some beautiful properties by the sea, a B&B at the beach where I also teach Yoga, a kitesurf and surf centre and a small surf shop! 
I believe it is vital to live in harmony with the nature and the rhythm of the sea, so I practice all the water sports that I can, depending on the conditions of the winds and of the waves: kitesurf, surf, windsurf and SUP Yoga! 
I love to travel and every year, when the tourist season is Sicily is over, I travel for 4 months and from host I become an Airbnb guest!
Besides from the sea, which is my greatest passion, I love to cook (vegetarian and vegan!), I practice (and teach) yoga, skate and I love to read books on Oriental Philosophies (Lao Tzu is always a source of Inspiration!). 
As a host I try to always to available, so please do not hesitate to get in touch if you need anything and of course get in touch if you would like to have suggestions on places to see and restaurants! 

My motto is: We are all one.
neighbourhood: Santa Maria del Focallo, Sicilia, Italy

host_about:
- Ciao a tutti mi chiamo Fabrizio e sono un  Property Manager siciliano il quale, iniziando quasi per gioco ad ospitare turisti nella propria casa, si è reso conto della grande soddisfazione e motivazione procurate dall’accontentare quegli ospiti che sono soliti apprezzare la cura di ogni minimo dettaglio della struttura in cui soggiornano.
Tutto ciò è stato da monito alla creazione di questa nuova realtà, di cui un importante pregio è la ricercatezza estetica, garantita da una certa accuratezza del design degli interni, dalla triade di eleganza, comfort e massima pulizia.
Tutti questi dettagli permetteranno di godere di un soggiorno estremamente piacevole, durante il quale ogni ospite si sentirà come a casa, ma molto più coccolato e spensierato! 
Amo seguire l'ospite dal check-in al check-out, disponibile sempre per qualsiasi cosa!
 
- Hello everyone, my name is Fabrizio and I am a Sicilian Property Manager who, beginning almost as a game to host tourists in his own home, realised the great satisfaction and motivation provided by satisfying those guests who are used to appreciating the care of every detail of the structure in which they stay.
All of this was an incentive for the creation of this new reality, an important asset of which is the aesthetic refinement, guaranteed by a certain accuracy of the interior design, the triad of elegance, comfort and maximum cleanliness.
All these details will allow you to enjoy an extremely pleasant stay, during which each guest will feel at home, but much more pampered and carefree! 
I love following the guest from check-in to check-out, always available for anything!

- Bonjour à tous, je m'appelle Fabrizio et je suis un Property Manager sicilien qui, en commençant presque pour le plaisir à accueillir des touristes chez eux, s'est rendu compte de la grande satisfaction et de la motivation que procure la satisfaction de ces hôtes qui ont l'habitude d'apprécier le soin apporté à chaque détail de la structure dans laquelle ils séjournent.
Tout cela a été une inspiration pour la création de cette nouvelle réalité, dont une valeur importante est le raffinement esthétique, garanti par une certaine précision du design intérieur, par la triade élégance, confort et propreté maximale.
Tous ces détails vous permettront de profiter d'un séjour extrêmement agréable, au cours duquel chaque invité se sentira comme chez lui, mais bien plus choyé et insouciant ! 
J'aime suivre le client du check-in au check-out, toujours disponible pour quoi que ce soit!

- Hallo an alle, mein Name ist Fabrizio und ich bin ein sizilianischer Hausverwalter, der fast aus Spaß anfing, Touristen in ihren Häusern zu beherbergen, er erkannte die große Befriedigung und Motivation, die durch die Befriedigung dieser Gäste, die gewohnt sind, die Pflege jedes Detail der Struktur, in der sie bleiben, zu schätzen.
All dies war eine Inspiration für die Schaffung dieser neuen Realität, von der ein wichtiger Wert die ästhetische Raffinesse ist, die durch eine gewisse Genauigkeit des Innendesigns, durch den Dreiklang von Eleganz, Komfort und maximaler Sauberkeit gewährleistet wird.
All diese Details ermöglichen Ihnen einen äußerst angenehmen Aufenthalt, bei dem sich jeder Gast wie zu Hause, aber noch viel mehr verwöhnt und unbeschwert fühlt! 
Ich liebe es, den Gast vom Check-in bis zum Check-out zu begleiten, immer für alles zu haben! 

- Hola a todos, me llamo Fabrizio y soy un Property Manager siciliano que, empezando casi por diversión a alojar turistas en sus casas, se dio cuenta de la gran satisfacción y motivación que proporciona el satisfacer a esos huéspedes que están acostumbrados a apreciar el cuidado de cada detalle de la estructura en la que se alojan.
Todo ello ha servido de inspiración para la creación de esta nueva realidad, de la que un valor importante es el refinamiento estético, garantizado por una cierta precisión del diseño interior, por la tríada de elegancia, confort y máxima limpieza.
Todos estos detalles le permitirán disfrutar de una estancia extremadamente agradable, durante la cual cada huésped se sentirá como en casa, ¡pero mucho más mimado y despreocupado! 
Me encanta seguir al huésped desde la entrada hasta la salida, siempre disponible para cualquier cosa.

host_about:
It is not easy to talk about me in a few words, probably not even in a million words. Anyway, my name is Eliana and I come from Italy. I graduated in Cultural Tourism and got a master degree in Modern Languages and translation for International relations. I like travelling. Travelling for me is more than a passion, it is like a lifestyle. I am not a tourist, I am an inhabitant of the world..of each place I visit. Travelling for me means to be part of a new world, get in touch with new people, knowing their culture, their history, their religion and also their culinary tradition…I like photography because it allows me to catch every single moment and keeps it in a bit of eternity. What do I like yet? I like food. Even food is part of our culture and I can’t deny I love eating. Good food makes me happy. 

If you want to discover the real Sicily I'll be happy to show you the authentic way.

Being a good host is not easy but I'll try to do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Any suggestion or critique will be welcome. I will be at your disposal if any problem will occur during your stay. If you don't like something, give me the possibility to remedy in time... I'd like that you could bring you back home a good memory of your holiday...


Elyana

name: VFH Villa Flavia Eco B&B room I Pesci 50m from Sea
description:
Villa Flavia Eco B&B is located in a cove called ‘Tre Piscine’ (Three Pools) by the sea, with easy access to the water. The Villa is located in an exceptional location, Capo Zafferano, a tourist resort with a holiday dimension, renowned for the purity of its sea.
The Villa consists of 4 double rooms, 1 triple room and 1 quadruple room all with private bathroom, mini bar, Nespresso, kettle. An exclusive and well-kept atmosphere. Children under 13 years are not allowed
neighborhood_overview: The room is located inside the B&B Villa Flavia. It is a residential area surrounded by greenery, with the beautiful rocky beach of Tre Piscine Cala del Cuore. It is unique in its kind, with a Caribbean and unspoiled sea.
host_about:
Benvenuti. Giusto poche parole per presentarci. Siamo Oscar & Stefano e qualche anno lavoriamo nel settore Accomodation/Tourism. Villa Flavia Eco B&B è il nostro fiore all’occhiello ma possediamo e gestiamo altre proprietà tra Milano e la Sicilia. Ho ereditato la Villa dai miei nonni paterni che nel lontano 1965 dal Piemonte, acquistarono questa casa per poter godere dello splendido clima e panorama mozzafiato della baia. Oggi siamo felici di condividere con i nostri ospiti l'emozione infinita di vivere in un piccolo angolo di paradiso in questa splendida località della Sicilia.
Amiamo molto viaggiare in tutto il mondo e, poiché molto esigenti, ci piace offrire sempre il meglio ai nostri ospiti! Amiamo stare sempre a contatto con i nostri clienti, ma rispettando sempre la loro privacy e spazi, e conoscerli ed è stato proprio questo aspetto la principale ragione che ci ha spinto a diventare Host qui in Airbnb! 
Assistiamo i nostri ospiti durante il loro soggiorno, forniamo mappe della città, opuscoli, insieme a tutte le informazioni di cui hanno bisogno e tutto quello che vogliono sapere sulla Sicilia.
Villa Flavia Eco B&B è una vacation experience in una meravigliosa location, per tutte le tipologie di viaggiatori, coppie, amici e famiglie che cercano relax, mare cristallino ed una atmosfera tutta mediterranea. La proprietà si trova in un punto strategico per coloro che vogliono visitare le meravigliose località d’arte della regione, da Palermo a Cefalù, da Castelbuono e tante altre. 
Saremo a Vostra disposizione durante il Vostro soggiorno per renderlo unico ed indimenticabile.
A presto!

name: La pagliera home
description:
Relax and recharge in thisoasis of tranquility and elegance. The property is a portion of an old farmhouse from the end of the 19th century, nestled within the archaeological park of the Valley of the Temples. The house has been refurbished for five years, maintaining all the architectural characteristics both inside and out, with exposed walls and tuff arches.
Outside you can use three parking spaces. The house enjoys spectacular exposure to both the south and north.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located on a small hill immersed in the countryside but close to the connecting road that leads to the valley of the temples to the city of Agrigento and also to the sea of San Leone.

name: Vacanza in residence sul mare di S. Vito Lo Capo
description:
Available from August 10 (check-in) to August 17 (check-out) 2024 for a seven night fixed stay.
Inside the Calamancina Village, the two-room apartment - about 45 square meters - is built on two floors: on the ground floor there is the living room with kitchenette (which also houses a double sofa bed), the bathroom with shower and a large veranda. Upstairs the sleeping area, with a balcony that offers a beautiful view of the sea.
host_about:
Nel campo dell’accoglienza, Nudge si ispira ai dettami classici dell’ospitalità siciliana, in base ai quali l’ospite è sacro. La cura con cui prepariamo le nostre case  prima del vostro arrivo, il calore con il quale vi diamo il benvenuto, l’attenzione alle vostre richieste ed esigenze prima e durante il soggiorno, sono tutte espressioni di rispetto, ma anche del piacere di avervi nostri ospiti. E la vostra soddisfazione è la nostra miglior ricompensa.

Nudge is inspired by the classical dictates of the Sicilian sense of hospitality, according to which the guest is regarded with great respect. The care we take in preparing the apartments before your arrival, the friendliness with which we welcome you, the attention to your requests and needs (before and during your stay) are all expression of respect, but also of the pleasure to have you as our guests. And your satisfaction is our best reward.

description:
To relax at the sea 10 meters from the beautiful beach of Gioiosa Marea.

The apartment is suitable for:
- a couple;
- 3 people;

neighborhood_overview: Menfi is a town in the province of Agrigento. It is an ideal base for visiting the most beautiful tourist attractions in the province. From Menfi you can easily reach four of the historical and cultural jewels of Sicily, namely the temples of Selinunte and Segesta, the ruins of Eraclea Minoa and the magnificent Valley of the Temples in Agrigento, places of great beauty able to fascinate even those who have no great interest for the ancient world. The area has beaches of extraordinary beauty that are highly sought after by everyone, Sicilians and non-Sicilians. Fine sand and crystal clear sea, a true natural spectacle, beautiful beaches where you can spend whole days in complete relaxation and where you can enjoy any moment of rest to catch your beloved tan. Since 1998, the beaches and the sea of ​​Menfi and in particular the sea of ​​Lido Fiori have been awarded the prestigious Blue Flag award issued by the Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE), for their environmental quality a

name: Cannolo pigro - seaview terrace, free parking spot
description:
Imagine waking up to the scent of a freshly brewed espresso. You slowly sip your coffee while swaying in the hammock and watching the sparkling waters of the Ionian Sea... The paragliders slide above your head and disappear behind the hill... What do you want to do today? How about kicking off the day with some granita in a local bar and then relaxing on the beach? Or do you feel like taking a trip to the nearby Taormina?
Whatever you choose, just lean back and enjoy the Sicilian dolce vita!
neighborhood_overview:
The "Tropicana Residence" is a place where you can regenerate and put your mind and body in a lower gear. The inhabitants of the condominium enjoy the peaceful and picturesque location that the condominium offers and will respect your privacy...

But no worries - you will not be bored - the nearest beach, cafes, restaurants and Co. are only ca. 600m from your doorstep.

-> Why Letojanni? Is it a good choice for me?

Letojanni is a perfect base to explore the eastern Sicilian coast with all its wonders of history, culture and nature.
This lovely fisherman´s town is well-known for one the widest and most enjoyable beaches on this side of the island. The coastline here is famous for its unique volcanic - and thus greyish-black sand-gravel and stony shores - all of this due to the vicinity of the one and only Madame Etna!

We love Letojanni for its lively seaside promenade full of cafes and restaurants with exquisite Sicilian cuisine. But the m
host_about:
Ciao!

My name is Klaudia and together with my husband Tomek I am happy to welcome you to "Cannolo pigro" - a home created by people who love Sicily for fellow Sicily-lovers. 
On everyday basis I live and work in Germany as a Paediatrician in specialty training.
The "Cannolo pigro" is the fruit of my passion for everything that's Italian, beginning with the exquisite cuisine (from which the name derives!) to the relaxed way of live with a solid dose of dolce far niente!  

See you in Bella Sicilia!

name: Wonderful Italy | Casa Meli dietro San Domenico
description: Studio apartment with mezzanine, located in Palermo historic center, a few steps away from La Cala e behind Piazza San Domenico.
neighborhood_overview: Palermo, one of the most beautiful cities of art in the country and the capital of Sicily, offers plenty of wonderful Unesco heritage sites that can be visited in the four historic districts of the city. In this regard, tourists can take part in the "Baroque itinerary of Palermo' to visit the main monuments of the city, such as the Church of the Holy Savior, the Church of Santa Maria del Monte Oliveto and the Church of the Conception. The city also offers the opportunity to participate in the "Tour of the Historical Markets of Palermo' which will allow guests to explore the markets of Ballarò and Capo. It doesn’t matter if it’s lunch or snack time, it is strictly required to taste the dishes with your hands only! This tour will also give tourists the opportunity to admire prominent buildings, streets and squares.
host_about:
Wonderful Italy is the largest Italian company of hospitality and experiences, in terms of number of directly-managed holiday homes and marketed tourist experiences. 

In addition to Sicily, we are active in Liguria, Sardinia, Apulia, Campania, Emilia-Romagna, Piedmont, Lake Garda, Lake Como and Venice, with an offer of over 2,000 homes and 350 experiences.

description:
Kick back and relax in this calm and stylish space.
A quiet spot in the lively fishing village of Fondachello. Walking distance to the beautiful and unspoiled beaches of Fondachello with its fish restaurants, bars and lidos. Perfectly placed for visits to the wine-producing villages on Mount Etna and charming Taormina. neighborhood_overview:
le decime retreat is perfectly placed for visits to the incredibly beautiful Taormina, the intriguing slopes of mount Etna and fascinating ancient city of Catania.
The beaches by us are well equipped and incredibly clean.
In the village of Fondachello (walking distance) you can find absolutely everything you need. Top rated restaurants, bars and beach resorts are only a few feet away. The village has two pharmacies, several grocery stores, a fish monger, tobacconists and even a petrol station.
In the town of Mascali, only 1 mile away you can find all kind of shops, restaurants, post office, banks, supermarket, take away food and plenty more
The town of Mascali was entirely rebuilt after its almost complete destruction by lava from the nearby Etna in 1928
Taormina is only 15 minutes drive away.
Catania airport is 40 minutes away.
The famous Etnaland water and theme park is also only 40 minutes drive.
Acireale with over 100 churches and its beaut

name: Casa vacanza al mare
description: Spend your summer holidays in a villa immersed in the Sicilian countryside, just 1 km from the crystal clear sea and 8 km from the historic center of Syracuse. The villa is equipped with all the comforts for a comfortable stay, with a spacious terrace perfect for sunbathing or organizing dinners outdoors. Enjoy the beauty of nature and discover the east coast of Sicily, visiting baroque cities such as Noto, Modica and Ragusa, or the natural reserves of Vendicari.
neighborhood_overview:
La Fanusa is a northern part of Syracuse, located north of Arenella. It's known especially for its beach, which is very popular during the summer. Fanusa beach is also a starting point for boat trips in the protected marine area of Plemmirio.
The area is well served by shops, restaurants, bars and other tourist services, which are mainly located along the road that connects Syracuse to Arenella and Fanusa.

A few kilometers away we find Il Plemmirio which is a marine protected area located on the southeast coast of Sicily. It is a real natural paradise, where you can find beaches, cliffs, sea caves and a crystal clear sea. It's great for snorkeling, scuba diving, or just relaxing by the sea.

Finally, the area is also rich in history and culture, with numerous archaeological sites and historical monuments, including the Greek theater of Syracuse, which is about 7 km away.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
Situated in Via Sangiuliano—one of Catania’s landmark street which literally cuts the city in half, all the way down to the sea—Dimora Di Marzo is literally a stroll away from the main Catania’s touristic attractions such as Piazza Duomo, Castello Ursino or Piazza Teatro Massimo. Similarly, it is less than 10 minutes’ walk away from the train station—in case you decide to catch a train to Taormina and visit the set of White Lotus Season 2— the harbour—if you fancy jumping into a ferry to Naples or Malta—or the metro (‘Stesicoro’ station) which you can take to reach Catania’s destinations out of the city centre or to the famous circumetnea, the regional railway line which almost completely encircles the Mount Etna volcano.

name: Wonderful Italy | Crispi Cozy Home
description: Bright and modern apartment a few steps from the island of Ortigia.
neighborhood_overview: For lovers of relaxation and the sea, eastern Sicily and the area surrounding Syracuse offer everything one could wish for. Starting from the ancient Greek city and heading south, the best equipped and most beautiful beaches to explore are Minareto, Fanusa, Arenella and Fontane Bianche, whose name derives from the natural freshwater springs and the particular white colour of the sand. On the island of Ortigia, you will also find equipped solariums (Zefiro and Nettuno) and a small free beach called Cala Rossa. Further south, some 30 km away, we find some beautiful unspoilt and inaccessible beaches, including Calamosche, Vendicari with its Natural Fauna Oasis and the beautiful San Lorenzo. For culture enthusiasts, the Greek theatre of Syracuse and the entire archaeological park with the Ear of Dionysius, a cave carved into the limestone in the shape of a human ear, the Paolo Orsi museum, and the Latomie dei Cappuccini, as well as Ortigia itself with its historical and cultural beauty as
host_about:
Wonderful Italy is the largest Italian company of hospitality and experiences, in terms of number of directly-managed holiday homes and marketed tourist experiences. 

In addition to Sicily, we are active in Sardinia, Liguria, Apulia, Campania, Emilia-Romagna, Piedmont, Lake Garda, Lake Como and Venice, with an offer of over 2,000 homes and 350 experiences.

neighborhood_overview: For relax and sea lovers, Eastern Sicily and the surroundings of Siracusa are the perfect choice. Leaving the ancient Greek city and going toward the south, the best equipped beaches worth of a visit are Minareto, Fanusa, Arenella and Fontane Bianche, whose name is due to the natural sweet spring water and to the unique white sand. Then, on the island of Ortigia there are some equipped solariums (Zefiro and Nettuno), as well as the free beach of Cala Rossa. Going further south, about 30 kms far away from Siracusa, there are amazing and wild beaches: Calamosche, Vendicari with its Wildlife Park and the precious San Lorenzo. For those looking for cultural and historical sites, it is recommended to visit Teatro Greco and its archeological site with the famous Orecchio di Dionisio (a limestone cave shaped as a human ear), the Museum Paolo Orsi, then the Latomie dei Cappuccini, and finally the island of Ortigia with its natural and historic eye-catching landscapes. name: Ortigia Studios - First Floor Apartment
description:
Cozy 38 sqm apartment, able to accommodate up to 3 people, located on the ground floor of a building overlooking a quiet pedestrian alley (1 step to access it). The accommodation is located in the heart of the island of Ortigia, the historic center of Syracuse, a few steps from the seafront and all the main attractions.
The apartment consists of a living area with a kitchenette, a sleeping area, a bathroom and small balcony.

*Taxi service from/to Catania Airport available upon request*
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located near the seafront of Ortigia, the oldest and most fascinating part of the city of Syracuse. On the island, connected to the mainland by the Umbertino Bridge, walking through the streets it is possible to admire centuries of history, splendid buildings, lively trattorias and cafés. It is possible to visit the Maniace Castle, the Fonte Aretusa, the ancient temple of Apollo and, absolutely not to be missed, the Duomo square, one of the most spectacular in all of Sicily.

Main points of interest:
- Temple of Apollo: 4 minutes on foot;
- Diana Fountain: 6 minutes on foot;
- Duomo: 9 minutes on foot;
- Fonte Aretusa: 13 minutes on foot;
- Maniace Castle: 20 minutes on foot.

- Ortigia Antica Locanda(fish restaurant): 2 minutes on foot;
- Market: 4 minutes on foot;
- Bar Cristina: 6 minutes on foot;
- inCoop (supermarket): 6 minutes on foot.

name: Palmento San Lorenzo 6, Emma Villas
description: This delightful house is located in a privileged geographical position, immersed in the beauty of the southeastern coast of Sicily. The proximity to Noto, just minutes away, offers easy access to one of the island's Baroque gems, known for its historic centre declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The presence of beaches nearby will allow sea lovers to enjoy breathtaking coastal landscapes.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the picturesque southeastern coast of Sicily, where the beauty of nature blends harmoniously with the rich cultural heritage of the region. The house is situated in a privileged location, offering a unique experience between the crystal clear sea and the historical charm of the surroundings. The beaches of San Lorenzo, a few minutes walk away, are known for their golden sand and crystal clear waters where you can enjoy relaxing days in the sun. A few kilometres away is the Vendicari Nature Reserve, a paradise for nature lovers where you can explore paths through lagoons, salt marshes and pristine beaches and observe migratory birds and discover the rich flora and fauna of the area. Just 7 km away is Marzamemi, an old fishing village of rustic charm where you can explore the cobbled streets, visit the central square and savour local delicacies in characteristic restaurants. At the same distance is Pachino, where you can sample and buy local products, such as the cherry tomato

neighborhood_overview: Palermo, among the most beautiful art cities in the country and the capital of Sicily, offers the wonder of Unesco heritage sites that can be visited in the city's four historic districts. The city also offers the opportunity to take part in the "Tour of Palermo's Historic Markets," which will allow guests to explore the markets of Ballarò and Capo, where lunch or snack it may be, at the Palermo market, dishes are to be "strictly" tasted with the sole help of the hands! This tour will also give tourists the opportunity to admire notable buildings, streets and squares.

name: Il vicoletto al Massimo
description: In the historic center, Il Vicoletto al Massimo is the ideal place to experience the authenticity of Palermo. Just a few hundred meters away, you'll find the Teatro Massimo, the Salinas Archaeological Museum, the Politeama, the Pretoria Fountain, and finally, the Cathedral. Despite its central location, the apartment nestled in its little alley offers a restorative tranquility, away from the bustle of the nightlife. It can accommodate up to 4 adults, with the possibility of an additional bed.
neighborhood_overview: Il Vicoletto al Massimo is located in a characteristic alley within the historic center of Palermo. The alley is situated in a tranquil and serene area. The surrounding neighborhood is characterized by a lively and multicultural atmosphere, with a variety of cultural activities and events taking place periodically. A few meters away are the Teatro Massimo, the Salinas Archaeological Museum, the Church of Olivella, the Pupi theater, the Pretoria fountain, the Quattro Canti, and also the Cathedral and the Politeama. But around the are also ancient buildings with ornate facades, narrow streets preserving traditional architecture characterized by cobblestones, historical buildings, shops, cafes, pizzerias, and restaurants of Sicilian, Palermitan, and Arab culture.

host_about:
Ciao A tutti vi propongo la mia casa vacanze che si trova a pochi passi dalla stazione ferroviaria e alla fermata dei Bus di Noto, precisamente a 500 metri dalla villa comunale di Noto, che è il viale alberato o l'inizio del centro storico di Noto. A pochi passi da tutti i servizi ma in zona tranquilla, e di facile accesso con qualsiasi mezzo. Ampie possibilità di parcheggio. L'immobile è composto da ingresso soggiorno abitabile con divano letto,  tv e tavolo da pranzo, cucina arredata di tutto frigo, freezer piano cottura e piano lavoro, Area lavanderia con pilozza,  lavatrice nuova così come tutti gli elettrodomestici e stendi abiti, grande camera da letto con possibilità di aggiungere lettino o\e culla. La casa è anche munita di zanzariere. AMBIENTE PULITISSIMO E NUOVO
Sono un uomo di 30 anni sposato con un bimbo piccolo, amo viaggiare con la mia famiglia e sono un amante di tutti gli sport e della natura. Mi piace socializzare ospitare ed essere ospitato, fare nuove amicizie e conoscere gente di ogni nazione e religione.

name: Sicily Beachside Apartment – 1 Minute to the Shore
description: Cozy 55 sqm apartment in Mascali, ideal for 4 people. Equipped with WiFi, air conditioning, and 2 balconies, the apartment offers comfort and convenience. Located just 1 minute walk from the beach, with a road next to the building providing direct access. Perfect for a relaxing seaside holiday, the apartment is the ideal choice for those seeking a prime location and modern amenities. Don't miss this opportunity to stay near the beautiful Sicilian coast!
neighborhood_overview:
Mascali is a charming town located on the eastern coast of Sicily, between Catania and Taormina. Known for its beautiful beaches and breathtaking views of the Ionian Sea, Mascali offers the perfect mix of relaxation and adventure. The town is steeped in history, with numerous archaeological sites and historic churches to explore.

Its proximity to Mount Etna allows for exciting excursions to the highest active volcano in Europe, while the nearby Etna Park offers hiking trails and spectacular scenery. Mascali is also famous for its local cuisine, where you can taste delicious Sicilian dishes made with fresh fish and local products.

Mascali's strategic location makes it easy to travel to other renowned tourist destinations such as Giardini Naxos, Isola Bella, and the enchanting town of Taormina. With its mild climate year-round, Mascali is the ideal destination for an unforgettable vacation, combining sea, mountains, culture, and gastronomy.

There are two flat-screen TVs, washing machine and a bathroom with shower. Bed linen and towels are included.

name: Dune
description:
Overview
Dune is located in Cava D Aliga, Sicily. This semi-detached vacation
rental property offers air-conditioning, Free Wi-Fi and sleeps up to 4
people with 2 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. Walking distance to the Beach.
host_about:
As an expression of my passion and love for traveling, I offer visitors the chance to experience and enjoy my beautiful property. 

I have the experience and knowledge necessary to make your stay enjoyable! My goal is to make you feel happy, safe, and confident that you will be satisfied with your stay, from the beginning to the end. 

Before your arrival, I will send you all the necessary arrival information, including driving instructions and key location. 

From the moment you arrive, you know that for whatever you may need during your stay, there will always be someone there to offer assistance or help with any request you may have. 

My phone is always available, and I respond directly to help you feel secure about your decision to book my villa.

name: Ortigia's Market Lovely Apartment
description:
Cozy 45 sqm apartment, able to accommodate up to 4 people, located on the first floor of a building with lift (some steps to access it) in the historic center of Syracuse. The accommodation is located on the island of Ortigia, right above the market, a few steps from the temple of Apollo and all the main points of interest.
The accommodation consists of a living room with a kitchenette, a bedroom and a bathroom.

*Airport taxi service from/to Catania Airport available upon request*
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of the wonderful island of Ortigia, a few steps from the Ortigia Market, a typical market full of local products and street food, where it is possible to and taste local delicacies.
Walking through the streets of the island, it is possible to admire centuries of history, splendid buildings, lively trattorias and cafés, as well as other monuments such as the Maniace Castle, the Fonte Aretusa and the Piazza del Duomo, one of the most spectacular in all of Sicily . In summer you can swim off the rocks or on some small beaches and solariums along the seafront. Breathtaking views can be admired throughout the year.
In the area you will find many other services such as a bank, post office, minimarket, restaurants, bars, shops and much more.

Main points of interest:
- Temple of Apollo: 3 minutes on foot;
- Piazza Duomo/Temple of Athena: 9 minutes on foot;
- Fonte Aretusa: 13 minutes on foot;
- Cala Rossa beach: 14
